attributes.additional_details: In the light of the latest monetry disaster in Cyprus and the eurozones bailout terms the method of raising the  required deposit to recieve the eurozones bailout monies should first claim back any and all bonuses paid to bank staff who mismanaged the economy and caused the banking problems then the money deposited by companies and individuals dodging paying tax and only then if this does not raise the required amount should depositors relatively small savings be attatched as these depositors arre less likely to be in a situation of tax evasion/avoidance
